clinical_history: Routine obstetric ultrasound for fetal growth.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Testes are ill-defined with normal vascularity.
Uterus appears hyperechoic; endometrial thickness measures 12.35 mm.
Urinary bladder is homogeneous, no intraluminal lesions.
Thyroid gland shows isoechoic echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Gallbladder shows normal, no stones or wall thickening.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 3.71 bpm.
